ValidationRule.description: Cannot Edit LeadBG field manually once the LeadBG field is edited by the excel add on offer Req 5544 - Validation rule update for AP2019 changes for Opportunities

ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead BG Field,Supporting BG ION,Supporting BG MN,Supporting BG NSW,Supporting BG FN, Supporting BG GS,Supporting BG NEN,Lead BU,Supporting BUs (ION), Supporting BUs (NEN) cannot be updated manually.
